ygData.subject: Re: enchanter q.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hell no, Enchanters Rule They can Go solo whenever they wan t. Their pets are awesome, My enchanter can solo and join groups. The only reason they say
ygData.messageBody:
Hell no, Enchanters Rule
They can Go solo whenever they wan't.
Their pets are awesome, My enchanter can solo and join
groups. The only reason they say enchanters are good
for groups is cause they are, they mold the battle to
what they want it to become. They can weaken and fear,
root and strength and haze. But if you goto
eqenchanters website you will see under the strategies
section that there are a lot of ways enchanters can go
solo with their pets. Whats fun about enchanters is
that they can Screw with the monsters while killing
them. Example: Orc Leggion that is red to me,
MEzmerize, Tashan, Root, Chaotic sphere, Suffocating
sphere, Mezmerice Root Etc... Except you can cast more
attack spells inbetween . This is how i killed them.
Anyway I had no pet then i'm sure i could have killed
it with less risk of dying with my pet. I'll tell you
now they are not that great till you hit about level 4
or 8 than you notice things but at 12 with your charm
spell you can have fun.
The Wanderer

--- Kubleais@... wrote:
> From: Kubleais@...
>
> I'm not in EQ yet, but I'm seriously considering it.
> Main question I have is
> whether it's really worthwhile/fun/possible to play
> the enchanter class solo?
> Stuff I've read so far kinda says that if you're
> not in a group, you're not
> goin anywhere...
>
>

The Wanderer
